entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 100 to 130 mm of rain. Peak rates of 10 to 20 mm/h expected Wednesday morning and again from Wednesday night. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Although the risk of east to southeast winds reaching severe gale is decreasing, there is still the possibility the strong east to southeast winds could have an impact until midnight Tuesday, and the Orange Wind Warning is now replaced with a Yellow Wind Watch. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Orange Wind Warning replaced with a Yellow Wind Watch.
